meanings.definition: The plural form of ischium, referring to the lower part of the hip bone.
meanings.sent1: The ischia provide support for the body when sitting.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the ischia to understand hip bone structure.
meanings.sent3: The ischia decided to take a break from holding up the body.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the ischia supporting her.
meanings.sent5: The ischia, like sturdy pillars, bear the weight of the body.

meanings.definition: A town on the island of Ischia in Italy.
meanings.sent1: Ischia is known for its beautiful beaches and thermal spas.
meanings.sent2: Tourists flock to Ischia to enjoy the Mediterranean climate.
meanings.sent3: The residents of Ischia organized a fun beach party.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of Italy, Ischia shines like a gem.
meanings.sent5: The charm of Ischia captivates visitors from around the world.
